data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tomikawa, Ko, Hirashima, Kentaro, Hirai, Atsushi, Uchiyama, Ryu (2018): A new species of Melita from Japan (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Melitidae). ZooKeys 760: 73-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.760.24778, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.760.24778
